  Her evil spark was  impowering to him. "I feel when you want to kill the 
beast. Take off its head and the body will die."

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  COLOR="#000080" SIZE=2 FAMILY="SERIF" FACE="Georgia" LANG="0"><B>  Her evil spark was  impowering to him. "I feel when you want to kill the beast. Take off its head and the body will die."</B></FONT></HTML>
